channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Stella_ola

item.title: PROJECT 1 :Amazon Reviews Analysis
item.description: INTRODUCTION Amazon Review sentiment analysis with NLP. This is a Sentiment Analysis project using Natural Language Processing(NLP).The data contained the people’s revies on amazons products, labels(the sentiment of people which are in zero’s (0) and one’s (1) where zero means the person is angry or sad or basically something negative while the one means a positive review and the id(which of course is irrelevant to us). The aim of this project is to compare the Na√Øve Bays model and the Logistic regression model to test and train the dataset to find the unknown class(data) prediction.

item.title: PROJECT 2 :Twitter sentiment analysis
item.description: INTRODUCTION Twitter sentiment analysis with NLP. This is a Sentiment Analysis project using Natural Language Processing(NLP). Here data was obtained from Kaggle which contained the tweets(tweets made by thousands of people), labels(the sentiment of people which are in zero’s (0) and one’s (1) where zero means the person is angry or sad or basically something negative while the one means a positive tweet and the id(which of course is irrelevant to us).

item.title: PROJECT 3 :Admission Chances for IVY league University
item.description: INTRODUCTION This is a project showing chances of student being admitted and here linear regression was used to predict those chances. Linear model performance was really good for the prediction which we can see on the image,where (>0.8) was the high chance of admission while the rest scatterd below. RESULT Click to see the full project. Link to GitHub Repository
